description: Soft, sensuous skin is just waiting to be uncovered on your feet, hands and other dry problem areas. Your skin's condition improves with each use of Pretty Feet & Hands Rough Skin Remover.

title: EARTHLY BODY Marrakesh X Leave In Treatment & Detangler 4oz/118ml
description: Earthly Body uses hemp seed oil in all of their products - body lotions, bath gels, massage oils, salt scrubs, sugar scrubs, shave creams, and now, even in massage candles. Science has proven that hemp seed oil is good for the body and skin.

title: Olivia Garden Nano Thermic Ceramic Ion Brush, 2 1/8 Inch
description: Olivia Garden's Nano Thermic brushes are brushes with unique bristles designs, they have special wavy heat resistant bristles with soft tips that are gentle on hair and scalp. They heat up faster and retain heat longer which gives you superior and long-lasting hairstyles. They provide anti-bacterial protection which keeps your hair healthier and that makes it easier to style. They have extra large vents that allow greater airflow and that reduces on drying time. They add more shine to your hair and eliminate frizz and flyaways.

title: Touch Me (®) Bath Brush-100% Pure Boar Bristle with Detachable Long Handle Bath Back Brush, Gift Ribbon packaging. Size: 3" x 16.5" Long Handle.
description: Touch Me () is a registered trademark and protected by copyright and trademark laws under U.S. and international law. All rights reserved. This long handle back brush is specially designed to clean those hard-to-reach spots on your body. The detachable head can come off to scrub your arms, legs and body. 100% Natural boar's hair bristles will deeply exfoliate away roughness and dirt by revealing newer skin cells. To use, wet brush and apply liquid cleansing gel, then gently brush your body. Rinse and hang to dry after each use to prolong the brush life.
